meanings.definition: A thin slice of bacon or ham.
meanings.sent1: For breakfast, I cooked up some delicious rashers of bacon.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was filled with juicy rashers of ham.
meanings.sent3: The rashers of bacon sizzled in the pan, tempting everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling rashers of bacon filled the kitchen like a comforting hug.
meanings.sent5: The crispy rashers of bacon were the highlight of the meal.

meanings.definition: A strip of leather used for binding or lashing.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman used a sturdy rasher to secure the pieces of leather together.
meanings.sent2: The rasher of leather was strong enough to hold the heavy load.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the rasher of leather, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The rasher of leather acted like a loyal friend, always keeping things together.
meanings.sent5: The worn rasher of leather told stories of many adventures.
